title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction, classification, fabrication of composites; strengthening mechanisms, mechanics of composite materials, design of composites; Reinforcements, production and treatment of particles and fibres, characterisation of composites, interfaces; cast metal matrix, powder metallurgical and in-situ composites - metal-polymer, metal-ceramic and metalmetal composites; applications of cerments, diamond tools, superalloys, discontinuously reinforced aluminium composites.
